item.title: Sam add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Sam add a quote by Sherrilyn Kenyon
item.description: "Life is a tapestry woven by the decisions we make." -- Sherrilyn Kenyon

item.title: Sam add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
item.description: "She understood now why her friend Elizabeth, with her near-genius, analytical mind gave wide berth to murder mysteries, psychological thrillers, and horror stories, and read only romance novels. Because, by God, when a woman picked up one of those steamy books, she had a firm guarantee that there would be a Happily-Ever-After. That though the world outside those covers could bring such sorrow and disappointment and loneliness, between those covers, the world was a splendid place to be." -- Karen Marie Moning
